Activity: Check emails and respond to any urgent queries from the vendor or internal team.
Follow up with @helpdesk-1 to gather any user-reported issues with the EHR system.
Analyze the collected issues and categorize them for prioritization. Share findings with @ehrdev-1 and @ehrdev-2.
Prepare a report on system performance and user issues to discuss with the vendor in the next meeting.
Call with the EHR vendor to discuss the performance report and any unresolved issues.
Update the documentation with notes from the vendor call and any action items.
Coordinate with @trainer-1 to ensure any system updates are communicated to end-users.
Review and organize vendor documentation for easy access.
